Episodes.Title: Sliding Bobs
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When Bob starts to lose his hair, Linda reminisces about his mustache and how it made her fall for him; the kids make up their own versions of how Bob and Linda met.

Episodes.Title: The Land Ship
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob thinks the upcoming Land Ship parade will increase business -- until he learns two porta-potties will be in front of his restaurant; Tina's friends tell her she is boring.

Episodes.Title: The Hauntening
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When Louise admits that she has never felt scared before, the family goes to a haunted house in an effort to change but mayhem ensues after their visit.

Episodes.Title: Gayle Makin' Bob Sled
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob goes to pick up Gayle so she does not miss the Thanksgiving celebration, but gets caught in a snowstorm coming back, leaving Linda to prepare the turkey.

Episodes.Title: Nice-Capades
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: A grumpy mall Santa threatens to put Gene, Tina and Louise on the naughty list, inspiring them to arrange a musical performance in hopes of changing Santa's mind before Christmas.

Episodes.Title: The Cook, the Steve, the Gayle, & Her Lover
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When Bob throws a dinner party, Gayle takes advantage of the opportunity to introduce her new love interest to the family; a long-standing feud is revealed.

Episodes.Title: The Gene and Courtney Show
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Gene and Courtney are given the opportunity to be the new hosts of morning announcements, but their romantic history poses challenges; Tina's plan goes awry.

Episodes.Title: Sexy Dance Healing
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob must take legal action after he slips on the sidewalk and needs to pay for surgery; Jairo promises to heal Bob without doctors; the kids fake a law firm.

Episodes.Title: Sacred Couch
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Louise wants the family to get a new couch, but the family votes against it. So she decides to take care of the problem herself.

Episodes.Title: Lice Things Are Lice
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When Tina volunteers alongside Nurse Liz, she finds herself involved in the biggest scandal to hit Wagstaff: a lice infestation. Meanwhile, Bob makes improvements to the restaurant that end up driving customers away. Can the Belch...

Episodes.Title: House of 1000 Bounces
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Mike Benner
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belcher kids hop into action after news of a bounce house crisis at a birthday party; Bob encounters a guest at the restaurant, fixing him to face a fear.

Episodes.Title: Stand by Gene
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: When Gene overhears talk about a mystical creature that lives nearby, he leads the Belcher kids and their friends on a journey to find it. Meanwhile, Linda's competitive nature takes over during downtime at the restaurant.

Episodes.Title: Wag the Hog
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belchers try to help Bob's friend, Critter, after he lands in jail for unpaid parking tickets; Linda takes a job as a babysitter.

Episodes.Title: The Hormone-iums
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina gets her wish for Wagstaff fame, but soon regrets it. Linda pursues an improbable business venture, but struggles to get it off the ground.

Episodes.Title: Pro Tiki/Con Tiki
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob's friend Warren comes to visit and makes an offer to invest in the restaurant; Bob is hesitant when he finds out about Warren's interior design ideas.

Episodes.Title: Bye Bye Boo Boo
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Louise enters a contest with the hopes that Tina will get to meet Boo Boo from Boyz 4 Now; Bob learns more about the history of the restaurant.

Episodes.Title: The Horse Rider-er
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina manages to convince her parents to send her to horse camp; but in doing so, she realizes she must end her relationship with her imaginary horse, Jericho.

Episodes.Title: Secret Admiral-irer
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina's ideas of love and romance are tested when she volunteers at a nursing home to earn her next Thunder Girls badge. Meanwhile, Bob makes new friends who lead him to make some questionable choices.

Episodes.Title: Glued, Where's My Bob?
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The Belcher children are involved in a goop war prank that takes place on the same day that a journalist is visiting the restaurant to write a profile.
